entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, referred to as 'he'.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: A friend of Harry's, who reacts with surprise and nervousness.

entities.name: bathilda
entities.description: A mysterious woman who is questioned by Harry.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: A powerful wizard mentioned as having abilities similar to Bathilda's.

relationships.description: Harry asks Bathilda if she is who he thinks she is.
Hermione reacts with surprise and nervousness when Harry speaks.
Bathilda leads Harry through several houses and a garden to her home.
Harry and Hermione look at each other before approaching Bathilda.
